idea-plugin.name: nzook
idea-plugin.description:
Github
  • A zookeeper client
    1. Provide a display of the zookeeper tree structure
    2. Can create, edit, delete and copy nodes
    3. Can view and edit node data, node metadata and control information

  • 一个 zookeeper 可视化工具
    1. 提供显示zookeeper的树结构
    2. 可以新建、编辑、删除和拷贝节点
    3. 可以查看和编辑节点数据、节点元数据和控制信息
